comment: You nailed it ! There is so many dumb slogan in politics that would be avoided if they took minutes to remember what was our [position/point of view] a few year ago. Comparing trump with trump for example... Shit they apparently even forgot al-qaeda even existed! now it's all ISIS. They barely remember anything older than one week
